thread.title: Girl posts “sexy” selfie, Twitter notices something disgusting instead (12 Photos)
thread.title_full: Girl posts “sexy” selfie, Twitter notices something disgusting instead (12 Photos)

author: Ben
title: Girl posts “sexy” selfie, Twitter notices something disgusting instead (12 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Recently, a Twitter user decided to share a photo of herself in what she thought was a sexy dress, with the caption “Going to dinner because I needed an excuse to wear this.” Nothing wrong with that, right? 
What she didn’t pay attention/thought the internet wouldn’t notice was that her room was an absolute disaster. And not like one of those ‘I’ve had a long workweek and haven’t had time to tidy up’ types of messes. No. We have old condiments, ingredients to make s’mores, a plethora dirty clothes and empty fast food cups. The worst part? These aren’t even the most disgusting things. See if you can find it before the end of the post. 2 
Here’s here original Tweet. 3 
And here’s an enlarged photo of the hazard zone. 4 
Side note: It doesn’t seem like this is an isolated incident. A quick glance through her photos proves having Chernobyl as a living area is par for the course. 5 
At first, people had some pretty standard reactions to her filthy living quarters. Advertisement
